name: ZACOHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on ZACO.”
”Alexa, turn off ZACO.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can control your vacuum by your voice. To get started make sure you download the ZACOHome App and registered a ZACOHome App account. Your ZACOHome robotic vacuum has connected and online. Then, you need to enable ZACOHome skills and fill in the ZACOHome App account on the authorization page. After using Alexa to discover the device, ZACOHome Robot will be added.
After successful connection, please try to say:
Alexa, turn on ZACO.
Alexa, turn off ZACO.
